Practice Round Instructions

You will now have {self.duration} seconds to practice with the experimental environment. The decisions you make in this round will not affect your earnings. At the beginning of the practice round {initialDistribution} of the cells are occupied with green tokens. The environment is a {self.resourceWidth} x {self.resourceDepth} grid of cells.

Tokens Regenerate

Image 1 Image 2

Best Strategy

The chance that a token will regenerate on an empty cell increases as there are more tokens surrounding it. The best arrangement of tokens that maximizes overall regrowth is the checkerboard diagram shown below.

During this practice round, and only during this practice round, you will be able to reset the tokens displayed on the screen by pressing the R key. When you press the R key you will reset the distribution of the tokens to once again randomly occupy {initialDistribution} of the cells with tokens.

If you have any questions please raise your hand. Do you have any questions so far?
